评论概述: Interesting pants with a unique design
评论详情: These are listed for men, but I think they're a unisex design, so I picked up a pair for myself.  I'm 5'5", 135lbs, and a size small fit fine. The material is nice and feels well-made. The pant legs are loose and about ankle length. The tie and fabric piece is tied from right to left. The left side of the pants has an interesting pleating detail that is hemmed together at the base (see the 5th description picture). I'm not sure yet if I like this detail because it makes this one leg look more like a balloon shape rather than a straight cut. Overall, I think these pants are very unique and I'm glad to have such a different-looking pair of pants in my wardrobe.

I'm going through a period in my later years where I am becoming a little more adventurous with how I present myself. I have seen pants like these before in the past but always though they looked a little weird, maybe a little feminine, a little gothic, a little kilt-ish but for some reason when these showed up on my feed I wanted to try them out.  The came in very plain packaging, just a sealed clear bag. They are a very synthetic material, possibly nylon but as such they hold their shape well. The waistband is elasticated so easy to pull on and off and they are comfortable. You need to get used to the length which is cropped in addition to the apron that fastens on the side. What I actually like about these is the silhouette these give, especially from the sides. I have been wearing them with oversized white shirts and black tees. Footwear wise, clumpy brogues, thick sandals and even adidas superstar look great with these.  I haven't washed them in the washing machine or dried them, I have opted to steam clean them instead, but I imagine they will wash well and last a long time due to the nylon material.
